location.address: 2-127 Kenneth H.Keller Hall, 200 Union Street SE

education.institution: University of Minnesota, Twin Cities, USA

awards.title: First Prize, Challange Cup National Undergraduate Academic Science and Technology Works Competition
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China
awards.summary: Our project 'New Electric Wheel Prototype Design' was awarded the First Prize in the national competition.

publications.name: A quadratic programming approach for network distributed l1 optimal control
publications.publisher: 2025 IEEE Conference on Decision and Control
publications.summary: In this work, we present an approximation approach for solving the distributed l1 output-feedback control problem. We provide tight upper and lower bounds for the optimal cost.

publications.name: Algebraic Riccati equation approach for network distributed optimal H2 synthesis
publications.publisher: 2024 IEEE Conference on Decision and Control
publications.summary: In this paper, we solve the optimal H2 control problem distributed over networks with an arbitrary graph, with the assumption that the controller network has no delays but only sparsity constraints.

publications.name: A synthesis approach for distributed H2 control problems with communication delays
publications.summary: In this paper, we find the solution to the discrete-time optimal H2 control problem distributed over networks with arbitrary graphs that include communication delays.

publications.name: Robust mean square stability
publications.summary: We extend the robust stability notion of Î¼ to include both deterministic and stochastic uncertainties and provide a computable sufficient condition that guarantees closed-loop Robust Mean Square Stability.

projects.name: Robust Mean Square Stability
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.

volunteer.summary: Leader for middle school summer-camp course design. Conducted mental health surveys on lcoal students.
highlights: Awarded First Prize in Tsinghua University Volunteer Service Competition
